title: How to Understand Relationships in Your Family Tree (Genealogy)

steps.title: Choose an ancestor that the two individuals have in common.
steps.content: Choose an ancestor that the two individuals have in common.

steps.title: Determine the simple relationship between the ancestor and the first family member.
steps.content: Determine the simple relationship between the ancestor and the first family member. Such as child, grandchild, great grandchild, great great grandchild .

steps.title: Determine the simple relationship between the ancestor and the second family member.
steps.content: Determine the simple relationship between the ancestor and the second family member. Again, it may be child, grandchild, great grandchild, great great grandchild .

steps.title: Cross reference those simple relationships from the table below.
steps.content: Cross reference those simple relationships from the table below.
